tasks.label: Remove fixed layouts in pages
args: $files = @('src/app/page.tsx','src/app/todo/page.tsx','src/app/stats/page.tsx','src/app/study/page.tsx','src/app/settings/page.tsx','src/app/login/page.tsx','src/app/signup/page.tsx'); foreach ($f in $files) { (Get-Content $f) -replace 'className="fixed inset-0[^"]*"','className="flex items-center justify-center"' -replace 'overflow-y-auto"[^>]*','"' -replace 'style=\{\{[^}]*\}\}','' | Set-Content $f }
